title: labops
content: A Kubernetes homelab project that automates the deployment and management of applications using a GitOps workflow

title: CVE-2025-1974
content: A minimal test tool to help detect annotation injection vulnerabilities in Kubernetes NGINX Ingress controllers. This script sends a crafted AdmissionReview request to simulate a potential exploit path from CVE-2025-1974 and checks for signs of misinterpreted annotations in controller logs

title: monitoring-provisioning
content: This project sets up a complete monitoring infrastructure, fully automated with Terraform and Ansible, deployed in a Proxmox environment. It provisions virtual machines for metrics, logs, visualization, by configuring Prometheus, Alertmanager, Grafana, Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana
